markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 4" pfs="Standard">[Lucky Break](/Spells.aspx?ID=430)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=26" />
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Fortune" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=76" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 393 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Domain**
[Luck](/Domains.aspx?ID=18)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Reaction" /></row>
<row>[verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

**Trigger** You fail (but don't critically fail) a saving throw.

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

Reroll the saving throw and use the better result. You then become temporarily immune for 10 minutes.
name: Lucky Break
